int compute ( int i , int j , int r ) { if ( r == 0 ) return 0 ; if ( b [ i + 1 ] [ j ] == 0 ) b [ i + 1 ] [ j ] = compute ( i + 1 , j , r - 1 ) ; if ( b [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] == 0 ) b [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] = compute ( i + 1 , j + 1 , r - 1 ) ; return max ( a [ i ] [ j ] + b [ i + 1 ] [ j ] , a [ i ] [ j ] + b [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; }
